verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: compared] [ARG1: an unnamed London hospital] [ARG2: to a " war zone "] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-ADV: saying despite tough gun laws in the UK , it has blood all over the floors from victims of knife attacks] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] compared an unnamed London hospital to a " war zone " on Friday , [V: saying] [ARG1: despite tough gun laws in the UK , it has blood all over the floors from victims of knife attacks] .
